channel.title: Aur on zerodivisible.io
channel.description: Recent content in Aur on zerodivisible.io

item.title: Archlinux and AUR packages signed With untrusted GPG key
item.description: Archlinux is a really interesting Linux distribution - and it’s one of my favorite ones. It might have a steep learning curve, but once you dig into it, it will work like a charm. Unless you will switch to some distro and want to come back after an undefined period of time. As recently I’ve been mostly using CentOS & RedHat Linux, I wanted to get back to Archlinux, just to spice things a little and see what’s going on in with my favorite distro.
